implement ERC165 itself

getRate
addCurrency

attributes.name: encodeCurrency

attributes.operations:
{
    ns := div(ns, 8)
    o := mload(0x40)
    mstore(0x40, add(o, and(add(add(ns, 0x20), 0x1f), not(0x1f))))
    mstore(o, ns)
    mstore(add(o, 32), b)
}
